detaileddescription.para: Transform color brightness from 8-bit space to percentage representation.

briefdescription.para: Pass a color value as a macro argument.

detaileddescription.para: LED_COLOR macro contains commas in its body. This means that after the argument is expanded, the macro is to be treated as multiple arguments. This also makes it impossible to pass an argument from macro level to another macro. The macro allows the usage of the color argument as an argument to another macro level.

parameterdescription.para: Any list of arguments that have to be treated as a single argument for the macro.

detaileddescription.para: Create LED color initializer for LED turned on.

simplesect.para: As arguments, pass the brightness levels for every color channel.

The macro returns the structure initializer that once expanded contains commas not placed in brackets. This means that when passed as an argument, this argument cannot be passed simply to another macro. Use LED_COLOR_ARG_PASS macro for the preprocessor to treat it as a single argument again.

detaileddescription.para: Create LED color initializer for LED turned off.
Create LED turned on effect initializer.
Create LED turned off effect initializer.
Create LED turned on for a brief period effect initializer.
LED color remains constant for a defined time, then goes off.

parameterdescription.para: Time LED will remain on in milliseconds.
Time in which LED will gradually switch to off (in milliseconds).

detaileddescription.para: Create LED blinking effect initializer with two periods as arguments.
LED color is periodically changed between the selected color and the LED turned off. This macro takes two periods: for on and off time.

parameterdescription.para: Period of time for which LED is on.
Period of time for which LED is off.

detaileddescription.para: Create LED blinking effect initializer with one period given
LED color is periodically changed between the selected color and the LED turned off. The same time is used for both: on and off time.

parameterdescription.para: Period of time between LED color switches.

detaileddescription.para: LED color is smoothly, gradually changed between the LED turned off and the selected color.

parameterdescription.para: Period of time for single substep.

briefdescription.para: Period of time between color changes while the LED is blinking (LED clock effect).
Period of time when the LED is turned off (LED clock effect).

memberdef.name: LED_EFFECT_LED_CLOCK
memberdef.initializer: { \ .steps = ((const struct led_effect_step[]) { \ { \ .color = LED_NOCOLOR(), \ .substep_count = 1, \ .substep_time = LED_CLOCK_SLEEP_PERIOD, \ }, \ LISTIFY(_ticks, _LED_CLOCK_TIK, (,), _color) \ }), \ .step_count = (2 * _ticks + 1), \ .loop_forever = true, \ }

detaileddescription.para: LED blinks a defined number of times, then it is turned off for a defined period of time. The sequence is repeated periodically.

simplesect.para: You can pass only one additional argument to the UTIL_LISTIFY macro, which in this case is LED color. Period is defined separately.
